Enter search terms or a module, class or function name.

Template Tags¶

critic_user_rating¶

Retrieves the user’s rating for a specified object

Syntax

{% critic_user_rating [object] as [varname] %}

Example

{% critic_user_rating story as user_rating %}

    You have rated this story a {{ user_rating }}

critic_render¶

Renders some template for a specific object.

Syntax

{% critic_render [object] %}

Example

{% critic_render entry %}

critic_render_url¶

When given a object, a url for rendering the rating method will be returned. This is simply here for convenience.

Syntax

{% critic_render_url [object] %}

Example

{% critic_render_url [object] %}

Output Example

/critic/render/11/2/
